Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Riviera in Segrate, you'll be minutes from Mondadori and close to Parco Dell'idroscalo. This hotel is within close proximity of Circolo Arci Magnolia and Exhibition Park Novegro.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 36 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, dry cleaning/laundry services, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
